name: Who's the peasant now?! (Tumblr)
description:
This userstyle adds a lordly castle to the top of your dashboard, so you can sneer at all the lowly peasants who are forced to live in tiny huts.

Follow me: aetiusrex @ tumblr for direct updates. Really, whatever.
additional_info:
http://aetiusrex.tumblr.com

Wow, believe it or not I updated! and again! And again!

Image credit for the castle goes to jaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaackson.tumblr.com !

0.1?
Made the code look tidier (I know right)
Moved the number to actually sit not-on-top of the castle. Don't want to move it up to keep it in line with the rest of the site.

0.2?
Raised the castle a bit to be in-line with the circular tumblr icons (gear and ?). Feels better, I think

0.3?
Tiny fix, changed the castle icon for the one supplied by the actual author!

0.4?
Another tiny fix. Nudged the castle 8 pixels to the left so there'd be roughly the same distance between all icons. I KNOW RIGHT?

0.5?
Nudged it by one pixel. Also fixed some open brackets.

0.6?
Code variation by Ohne Mitleid. Made some adjustments because reasons. Sorry bro
If this ends up causing more bad than good let me know and I'll put the old code back even though it's not exactly effective
fingers crossed
